fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role can spawn. When it does, the day chat is immediately sent the following message: *The sound of blaring sirens echoes through the town.*
- While a player with this role is alive, no roles can spawn, aside from the spawning of roles at the very beginning of the game.
- At the beginning of every day while a player with this role is alive, the day chat is sent the following message: *Sirens continue to blare.*
- Every night, the amount of actions you may perform during any phase is increased by 1 permanently.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack another player at night.
- Select another player at night; For the next 2 day & night cycles, become immune to all of their abilities that would directly affect you, including attacks, and any of their abilities that would not directly affect you will be randomly redirected to a different player if it would target you.
- Roleblock another player at night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: This role can win the game. Kill all who would oppose you.
